MaPo Kinnord (amụrụ n'afọ 1960 na Cleveland, OH) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi nke bi na New Orleans, Louisiana.
Ọ gụsịrị BFA ya na Massachusetts College of Art na Boston, ma nata MFA ya na Mahadum Ohio State na Columbus. N'afọ 1995, ọ kwagara New Orleans, LA ébé ọ zutere otu n'ime ndị nkụzi ya, John T

N'iji ụdị ihe a tụrụ atụ nké yiri ụlọ apịtị nke Ghana, ọrụ Kinnord bụ màkà ncheta ndị nna nna. Ọ nọrọ oge na Northern Ghana na-emepụta vidiyo nyocha banyéré ite na ihe owuwu ceramic. Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ihe owuwu ma na-enyocha ma n'èzí ma n'ime site na ụrọ na nhazi elu
O jikwa ụzọ o si arụ ọrụ na ụrọ tụnyere jazz, improvisational ma nwee nhazi.

Akụkụ nke ọrụ Kinnord dị ka ónyé nkuzi gụnyere ọgwụgwọ nka na-eji ntụgharị uche na-achịkwa ụrọ. Ọ bụ ónyé nkuzi na Penland School of Crafts, na North Carolina, Haystack Mountain School of Craft na Maine. Kinnord kụziri na MassArt na Massachusetts na Berkeley California tupu ọ kwaga New Orleans na 1995 ébé ọ ghọrọ Associate Professor of Art na Xavier University of Louisiana.

E gosipụtara ọrụ Kinnord na mbà ụwa gụnyere na Arthur Roger Gallery, Mahadum Tulane, Baltimore Clayworks, Stella Jones Gallery, Swarthmore College, Contemporary Arts Center na New Orleans, Ogden Museum of Southern Art, na Imago Mundi.

N'afọ 2017, e tinyere ọrụ ya n'ihe ngosi a na-akpọ Congregation at Antenna Gallery N'afọ 2018, a gụnyere ọrụ Kinnord na The Whole Drum Will Sound: Women in Southern Abstraction na Ogden Museum of Southern Art n'akụkụ ọrụ Lynda Benglis, Dusti Bongé, Clyde Connell, Dorothy Hood, Marie Hull, Lin Emery, Margaret Evangeline, Cynthia Brants, Jacqueline Humphries, Valerie Jaudon na Ida Kohlmeyer.
